Gaming a little.

Nov 14, 2007 â€¢ Alejandro

Super Mario Galaxy is out for the wii , and according to the reviewers on metacritic it is awesome. It's about time because I need a good wii game, I've been playing mostly gamecube games with my kids ( Mario Strikers and Pokemon , suck btw)




Two games were released this week for the PS3 platform, the first one : Call of Duty 4 excellent and Ratchet and Clank Future , a.k.a. "the reason why you bough the PS3". Playing the Ratchet demo feels a lot like previous games only smoother and better, not a bad thing.



"Uncharted" is probably the game I am most looking forward to play this holidays an also beautiful game, that is getting top scores all around.
(I was killed three time when playing for the first time in the demo level because i was admiring the graphics on the jungle or the facial animation of the characters.)

Continuing with the PS3 the official blog has some neat videos of the use of the EYE camera to create small demo games, nice.


On the PC side my list include BioShock and Crysis, but I have the feeling that Crysis will be too much for my PC.
